‚Ä¶ This park is definitely family friendly, and seems to cater to the wealthier KC suburbs. Boat rentals and stuff are pretty pricey. There are shower facilities down by the beach, and the lake is pretty. Decent hiking trails.

‚Ä¶ but could  use some improvements such as replacing  trees  which have been  cut down  over the years.  One of the  sites we stayed  in with our camper could use a fresh topping  if gravel. Shower houses are OK but need to be freshening  up.

‚Ä¶ .  Campsites were spacious.  Firewood for sale was a joke at $1 per "stick".  Bathrooms were so gross I felt dirtier coming out of the shower than when I went in.  Dirty, mildewy shower curtains.  Floors appeared clean.  Toilets ‚Ä¶
I was highly impressed with the camping sites. The shower houses were clean and the water was hot. There was no hand soap in the bathroom though. The beach was nice. This place is beautiful.

‚Ä¶ wheel right off the lake for 6 days. Fishing, trails, and full hook ups or pitch a tent with no connections at all. It's a pet friendly area and has shower houses that I would give an 8 out if 10 rating overall. I will be back, FOR SURE!
